title: CareHive Precision Health
summary: A predictive care companion that turns fragmented health journeys into proactive insight for providers and patients alike.
problem: Clinicians were drowning in delayed lab signals and manual reporting, leaving patients without timely course corrections.
solution: We designed a longitudinal insight graph that merges EHR, wearable, and conversational inputs into one adaptive command surface.
outcomes: 4x faster risk-flag routing to care teams
Dynamic care plans that auto-update with every new signal
HIPAA-ready governance controls with full auditability

title: Natural History Museum Immersive
summary: Digitally-guided tours and living exhibits that blend archival collections with responsive storytelling.
problem: Guests struggled to connect physical galleries with the museum's sprawling digital archive.
solution: We choreographed an AR-ready storyline that syncs volumetric captures, proximity beacons, and curator narratives in real time.
outcomes: 30% longer dwell time in climate exhibits
New membership sign-ups woven directly into the tour
Dynamic CMS tooling that empowers curators to ship stories in hours

title: DailyWire+ Platform
summary: Unified subscription, live community, and media commerce surfaces for the DailyWire+ ecosystem.
problem: Viewers bounced between standalone livestreams, podcasts, and stores without a coherent journey.
solution: We orchestrated a modular design system with shared identity, synchronized watch parties, and shoppable moments.
outcomes: Subscription conversion up by double digits
Latency-safe live chat layered on top of video
Creator tooling that schedules multi-surface drops

title: Masdar City Operations Portal
summary: Command-center visualizations that orchestrate clean energy assets across the Masdar innovation district.
problem: Energy, transit, and research tenants ran disconnected monitoring stacks.
solution: We unified IoT, BIM, and ESG data into a single glass pane with scenario planning baked in.
outcomes: Automated exception routing to on-site crews
Live carbon ledger with investor-ready reporting
Digital twin sandbox for urban experiments

title: Interblock Arena
summary: A tactile gaming intelligence layer that merges biometric telemetry with responsive dealer tools.
problem: Dealers and players lacked shared context to manage live experiences at scale.
solution: We built a multi-surface control center with haptic prompts, lighting cues, and AI coaching for every table.
outcomes: Frictionless loyalty handoffs mid-session
Dynamic lighting scenes that react to live odds
Biometric data distilled into simple readouts

title: Weir Group Reliability Cloud
summary: Predictive maintenance workflows that surface risk, cost, and sustainability insights for engineers in the field.
problem: Equipment telemetry lived in siloed historian systems without unified risk scoring.
solution: We created a reliability brain that pairs ML predictions with human-centered triage and guided work orders.
outcomes: Mean time to repair reduced dramatically
Automated ESG traceability for every action
Connected mobile tools that work offline

title: StreamLayer Fan OS
summary: Modular fan engagement OS that fuses broadcast, betting, and community overlays without latency.
problem: Rights holders needed a single stack that could personalize live games per viewer.
solution: We shipped a layout engine that matches intents (bet, buy, cheer) with interactive overlays in <16ms.
outcomes: Context-aware offers timed to live plays
Realtime community rooms with mod tooling
Unified data spine across properties

title: Awager AI Companion
summary: Ethical wagering assistant that contextualizes risk models with just-in-time guidance for responsible play.
problem: Players lacked a transparent view into risk signals while regulators demanded stronger safeguards.
solution: We paired explainable AI with personal finance heuristics to guide every stake and break moment.
outcomes: Real-time insight feed tuned per jurisdiction
Companion mode that intervenes before risk spikes
Shared dashboards for players, compliance, and partners
